scripts.deploy:dist: aws s3 sync dist s3://$YC_BUCKET --endpoint-url https://storage.yandexcloud.net --delete
scripts.deploy:content:blog: aws s3 sync public/blog s3://$YC_BUCKET/blog --endpoint-url https://storage.yandexcloud.net --size-only
scripts.deploy:content:perpost: aws s3 sync public/posts s3://$YC_BUCKET/posts --endpoint-url https://storage.yandexcloud.net --size-only --exclude "posts.json"
scripts.deploy:content:posts: aws s3 cp public/posts.json s3://$YC_BUCKET/posts.json --endpoint-url https://storage.yandexcloud.net --cache-control "no-store"
